price: 31. Nous sommes bien vos alliés en ce bas monde et dans l’autre, où vous aurez tout ce que désireront vos âmes et tout ce que vous demanderez.
arabic: نَحۡنُ أَوۡلِيَآؤُكُمۡ فِي ٱلۡحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنۡيَا وَفِي ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِۖ وَلَكُمۡ فِيهَا مَا تَشۡتَهِيٓ أَنفُسُكُمۡ وَلَكُمۡ فِيهَا مَا تَدَّعُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: naḥnu awliyāukum fī al-ḥayati al-dun'yā wafī al-ākhirati walakum fīhā mā tashtahī anfusukum walakum fīhā mā taddaʿūna
